messages.title: Fighting Hard for our Local Economy
messages.content: Working hard to help build a strong local and national economy from the centre ground of politics. Investing in jobs...Investing in South Ribble's Future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment not cuts is the key.
A strong vote for local charities.
Supporting jobs in the Defence & Aerospace industry in South Ribble.
Free care at home...ONLY with a Labour Government.

issues.economy: Investment not cuts is the key.
issues.health: Free care at home...ONLY with a Labour Government.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Borrow MP - Standing up for South Ribble for the past 13 years.

images.caption: David Borrow visiting local businesses and engaging with constituents.
